patthana15.41:1.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.41:2.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
